landing.supercharge: បញ្ចូលទឹកប្រាក់បន្ថែមលើការបង្ហោះ WordPress របស់អ្នកជាមួយនឹងការវិភាគគេហទំព័រលម្អិត ឧបករណ៍ទីផ្សារ សុវត្ថិភាព និងការបម្រុងទុកទិន្នន័យទាំងអស់នៅកន្លែងតែមួយ។

landing.web_app_desc: យើងរចនានិងបង្កើតផលិតផលឌីជីថលជា មួយនឹងបច្ចេកវិទ្យាឈានមុខគេ។
landing.blockchain_nft_desc: យើងជួយអ្នកឱ្យអនុវត្តបច្ចេកវិទ្យា blockchain ចុងក្រោយបំផុតចំពោះអាជីវកម្មរបស់អ្នក ដូចជាការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍វេទិកា blockchain និមិត្តសញ្ញា NFT ដំណោះស្រាយការទូទាត់ជាដើម។
landing.design_marketing: ការរចនា និងទីផ្សារ
landing.design_marketing_desc: យើងបានបង្កើតការរចនាដ៏អស្ចារ្យដែលផ្លាស់ប្តូរស្តង់ដារ​ នៃអាជីវកម្មរបស់អ្នកតាមរយៈវេទិកាអនឡាញ និងក្រៅបណ្តាញផ្សេងៗ។
landing.service_for_you: សេវាកម្មសម្រាប់អ្នក។
landing.service_for_you_desc: យើងចង់ក្លាយជាផ្នែកមួយ ឬជោគជ័យរបស់អ្នក។ ពីម៉ាកយីហោរហូតដល់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ផលិតផល យើងផ្តល់សេវាកម្មទាំងអស់ក្នុងតែមួយសម្រាប់ភាពជោគជ័យរបស់អ្នក។
landing.system_development: ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ប្រព័ន្ធ
landing.system_development_desc: ស្ថាបត្យករ ដំណោះស្រាយគាំទ្រដ៏រឹងមាំ និងអាចធ្វើមាត្រដ្ឋានបាន ដើម្បីផ្តល់ជូននូវបទពិសោធន៍ដ៏ល្អបំផុត ការរួមបញ្ចូល និងការវិវឌ្ឍន៍ប្រព័ន្ធដែលមានស្រាប់ ឬការកសាងដំណោះស្រាយផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនពីការកោស។
landing.web_mobile_development: ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍គេហទំព័រ និងទូរស័ព្ទ
landing.web_mobile_development_desc: ដំណោះស្រាយឆ្លងវេទិកាមានសារៈសំខាន់។ យើងផ្តល់នូវបទពិសោធន៍ដែលមើលឃើញដ៏អស្ចារ្យ សម្រាប់ផលិតផលរបស់អ្នកនៅគ្រប់វេទិកាទាំងអស់។
landing.blockchain_nft_solution: ដំណោះស្រាយ BlockChain & NFT
landing.blockchain_nft_solution_desc: យើងផ្តល់សេវាកម្មអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ blockchain ដើម្បីផ្តល់នូវប្រព័ន្ធ blockchain ដែលអាចទុកចិត្តបាន ដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យមានការពង្រឹងការតាមដាន សុវត្ថិភាព និងដំណើរការទិន្នន័យ និងប្រតិបត្តិការលឿនជាងមុន។
landing.doubleda_means: Doubleda មានន័យថា
landing.doubleda_means_desc: Doubleda គឺជាអ្នកឯកទេសក្នុងការរចនាផ្នែកទន់ និងវិស្វកម្ម ដោយផ្តល់ជូននូវសេវាកម្មពេញលេញដើម្បីផ្តល់នូវដំណោះស្រាយកម្មវិធីដ៏រីករាយ។ យើងអាចជួយអ្នកក្នុងការបំប្លែងគំនិតទៅជាផលិតផលដែលអាចដំណើរការបានពេញលេញ ដោយចាប់ផ្តើមដោយការកំណត់គោលដៅ និងបង្កើតផែនទីបង្ហាញផ្លូវទៅកាន់ដំណោះស្រាយដ៏ល្អបំផុត។

id_1.title: កាក់អេឡិចត្រូនិច NFT
id_1.detail_title: ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍កម្មវិធី និងប្រព័ន្ធ
id_1.detail_desc: DigiNFT គឺជាកម្មវិធីទីផ្សារ NFT ជួញដូរទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ NFT ផ្សេងៗ និងផ្តល់កាបូប NFT ព័ត៌មានកាក់
id_1.project_type: ប្រព័ន្ធ, កម្មវិធី
id_1.title_1: ដំណោះស្រាយ
id_1.title_2: បច្ចេកវិទ្យា និងឧបករណ៍

desc_1.sub_1: ការរចនាកម្មវិធី
desc_1.sub_2: លក្ខណៈពិសេសនៃការជួញដូរ
desc_1.sub_4: ប្រវត្តិរូប និងសហគមន៍
desc_1.sub_5: ប្រព័ន្ធអ៊ីមែលទីផ្សារ

desc_2.sub_1: ប្រតិកម្ម JS

id_2.title: Hansmile Trading
id_2.detail_desc: Hansmile is Trading Agency and the system development focused on CRM and Notice Board. Marketing email system was integrated and individual customer supporting system was developed.

id_3.title: TopTravel Online Travel
id_3.sub_title: Online Travel information Booking and Planner
id_3.detail_desc: Creating beautiful travel & tourism website design and portal development that really captures the spirit of travel, adventure and holiday. Main focus of this project is to build high-quality custom travel websites that have the latest technologies such as live booking confirmation, Travel Planner, App notification.

id_4.title: Yuanta Securities (Cambodia) Plc.
id_4.sub_title: The 1st fully-licensed securities firm in Cambodia and 1st Sole underwrite and lead manager.
id_4.detail_desc: The Yuanta Securities provides brokerage, research and various advisory services such as IPO, Public bonds, M&A, Private dept financing. The service requires full-stack development starting from Website (frontend) to Operation System (backend) and also requires to develop a blog posting, marketing email system.

id_5.title: Alternative Intelligent Solution Ltd
id_5.sub_title: Wholesaler of electronic and telecommunications equipment and parts.
id_5.detail_desc: The Alternative Intelligent Solution Ltd is a private limited company located in UK and it’s main business activity is Wholesale of electronic and telecommunications equipment and parts.

id_6.title: Artbox 3d Museum
id_6.sub_title: Welcome to The World Best Trick Art Museum Art Box!
id_6.detail_desc: 3d Mapping project, designing 3d mapping for their main hole with size of 20m x 30m x 15m(h) and 4 displaying screen walls. For projection mapping, a technique is used that can convert any surface into a dynamic visual display. Though many ways can create the same effect but combining the 2D or 3D data with some computer animations can highlight the required features and diminish not such relevant things.

id_7.title: Dashi Restaurant
id_7.detail_desc: Dashi restaurant is a very first modern Japanese restaurant. Interior design and construction were of major design importance.

id_8.title: Melo Restaurant
id_8.detail_desc: MELO restaurant is a modern french restaurant located in heart of Phnom Penh City. Full packaged-branding service (from Interior design to Menu & Content Design).

id_9.title: Skyangkor Airlines
id_9.sub_title: The best and biggest Airlines operating in Cambodia
id_9.detail_desc: The Skyangkor Airline is a leading market Airline company. The service requires full-stack development starting from Website (frontend) to Operation System (backend) and also requires to develop a Ticket Booking system, integrate with Payment gateway.

private_blockchain_network_desc: We help create private decentralized blockchain network that provide increased traceability and security of data and transactions.
smart_contract_desc_1: We provide the benefits of business automation to your business with smart contracts.
smart_contract_desc_2: Our smart contract platform enables you to use for following industries.
crypto_wallet_desc_1: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors.
crypto_wallet_desc_2: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
tokenization_nft_desc_1: Tokenization is the process of exchanging sensitive data for nonsensitive data called “tokens” that can be used in a database or internal system without bringing it into scope.
tokenization_nft_desc_2: We provide services and platform that allow clients to create, manage and trade their tokens (including NFT platforms).
